attributes.action: Allow the UK people to take control and decide how we leave the Eu
attributes.additional_details:
The country needs stability to be able to move forward, all these constant blocking votes, delays and arguments are hurting the countries economy more than brexit ever could
It's time for the country to remind the ministers that this is our country and they are there to carry out our will, not what they want but what we have voted for
We were promised free trade, closed borders, control of our laws and take back economic control, a watered down brexit will not give us this
Let's take control
attributes.background:
The uk parliament cannot decide how we are going to leave the Eu.
This petition is to put in place a peoples vote, but not a vote to remain or leave as that has already been decided.
This vote would be a simple 1. leave with the deal, 2. Leave with no deal
Let us decide
